default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Nice to meet you. Are you the Chief of MBCC? Before I act, better keep your head on your shoulders. You are worth a lot.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: You increase my power even though you know I'm dangerous. Do you think I'm no threat to you?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I am your personal blade. A sharp blade that swings towards the Garden and slices those who used to look down on me to pieces!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: You won't be able to run away if I find you.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: What a weak opponent... You look down on me?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Impossible... impossible!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Don't worry, this won't hurt at all.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Weakness... is a sin...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Wow, such tight security! Ha... seems like you recognize my strength.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: It's too quiet here. It reminds me of the Garden's ominous atmosphere. In any case, I still prefer it over the chaos and noise of the Syndicate.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Many in the Garden obsess over "the art of flower arrangement," but... I don't get it. Assassination is assassination. Why involve so many unrelated things?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: It's so thrilling to hear so-called "strongmen" howl... don't you think so?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: When I was saved by the Garden, I wanted to be a killer just like them. Ha... haha... how dare they say that I am weak! How dare they say that I am not worthy of joining the Garden!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: "Gekkabijin" is the name I gave to myself. Not everyone is qualified to receive a name from the Garden. But now, if I become the strongest killer in the Garden with your power... Can't wait to see the look on that so-called Mentor's face!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: That "cherry blossom" move almost killed me, but with you around... I should be able to handle it easily. Hmph... it should be her turn next!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Thank you, Chief. After I take down all the Garden killers, I will gift you their heads! Then finally... finally I will get to enjoy you!

default.title: Idle
default.text: Whenever I think about the beautiful flowers withering away in this city... I become overjoyed!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Heart, artery, brain... where do you want to be cut open?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Do you pay so much attention to me because you're afraid I'll attack you?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: You're sending me out? It must be a thrilling mission, right?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Ah... what a bummer. I thought I could meet a worthy foe.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Oh Garden... wait and see.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: I hope my opponent this time can put up a tough fight.
